nutanix_dashboard_reinstall_node_descrip: You are about to reinstall AOS and AHV on your node. Specify unused IP addresses in your cluster network.
nutanix_dashboard_reinstall_node_tips: For simultaneous re-installation on multiple nodes, please use the API
nutanix_dashboard_reinstall_node_success: Your reinstallation request has been processed. This operation may take up to 1 hour
nutanix_dashboard_reinstall_node_error_b: Your reinstallation request was not successful. If the error persists, please contact support
nutanix_dashboard_reinstall_form_not_pri: This field only accepts private IPv4 addresses
nutanix_dashboard_reinstall_ip_tooltip: The IP address must be included in the cluster subnet.
